Trade/Device Name(s): artus® C. difficile QS-RGQ MDx Kit
Regulation Name(s): Clostridium difficile toxin gene amplification assay
Analyte(s): Clostridium difficile toxin B variant gene (tcdBv)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for artus C. difficile QS-RGQ MDx Kit, a PCR assay for qualitative detection of C. difficile toxin A and B genes in human stool specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of toxigenic Clostridium difficile toxin A and toxin B genes in human liquid or soft stool specimens from patients suspected of having C. difficile associated disease, to aid in the diagnosis of C. difficile infection.
